metadata.title: CVE-2024-8096 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: When curl is told to use the Certificate Status Request TLS extension,often referred to as OCSP stapling, to verify that the server certificateis valid, it might fail to detect some OCSP problems and instead wronglyconsider the response as fine.  If the returned status reports anothererror than 'revoked' (like for example 'unauthorized') it is not treated asa bad certficate.

criterions.comment: curl package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
